headline: Nortal Acquires Nearsure to Expand AI Enterprise Solutions Across the Americas
summary: Nearsure’s Tech Talent Combines with Nortal’s U.S. Scale and Global Reach, Powered by a Shared Customer-first VisionKIRKLAND, Wash., July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nortal, a multinational digital transformation company, today announced its acquisition of Nearsure, a U.S.-based technology solutions provider with talent across 18 Latin American countries. The merger accelerates Nortal’s expansion across the Americas by tapping into Latin America’s world-class tech talent and increasing capacity

headline: Adobe Inc. (ADBE): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Adobe Inc. on Compound & Fire’s Substack. As of 8ᵗʰ July, Adobe Inc.’s share was trading at $373.38. ADBE’s trailing and forward P/E were 23.92 and 18.17 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Adobe Inc. and ServiceNow are two tech giants competing in the quality investing space. Adobe, a […]
